title: Angel Chakra Meditation with Crystal Singing Bowls (CD) | Medium Bonnie Page
description: PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING AND TAXES. SHIPS ONLY TO THE U.S.Experience healing, chakra balancing, and connection with your intuitive awareness during this 27-minute meditation. Medium Bonnie Page connects you with the essence of the Archangels who assist you with their loving energies. Intuitive musician Nina Vecchi channels cosmic melodies through the accompanying sounds of quartz crystal singing bowls infused with the precious gems and healing intentions to accentuate your chakra journey. There is a crystal singing bowl chakra clearing also included on the CD.
